sentences.en: A Dudley , flesh - colored or brown nose shall disqualify.
sentences.cn: 肉色或棕褐色与鼻不符合标准.

sentences.en: Disqualify pharmaceutical is prohibit to is import.
sentences.cn: 不合格的药品禁止进口.

sentences.en: Failures attributed to equipment, test setup or operator deficiencies shall not disqualify the product.
sentences.cn: 由于设备 、 测试设定或操作者不充份应判退件.

sentences.en: He always managed to find some fault in them which would disqualify them.
sentences.cn: 他总是想办法在他们身上挑毛病说他们不合格.

sentences.en: Her criminal record disqualify her from serving on a jury.
sentences.cn: 她有犯罪前科所以不能当陪审员.

sentences.en: His height alone would disqualify him for the position of teacher.
sentences.cn: 光是他的身高就使他不适合当老师.

sentences.en: If the goods were found disqualify or shortweight on arrival, are we entitled to lodge claim?
sentences.cn: 假如货物运达时发现品质不合格或短重, 我们是否有权提出索赔?

sentences.en: Primary color which is ninety percent ( 90 % ) or more shall disqualify.
sentences.cn: 主要颜色占90%或更多属于失格.

sentences.en: The House of Lord has the right to disqualify him from sitting in the House.
sentences.cn: 上议院有权取消他在议会中的席位.

sentences.en: The lack of a good education might disqualify you from some jobs.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏良好的教育,可能使你不适合做某些工作.

sentences.en: Thomson was disqualified from the 400 metre freestyle.
sentences.cn: 汤姆森被取消了400米自由泳的参赛资格。

sentences.en: Traditional products do not disqualify the producer from high - tech.
sentences.cn: 生产传统的产品,不表示它就不是高科技.

sentences.en: What shall we do if the goods are found shortweight or disqualify on arrival?
sentences.cn: 如果货物运达时发现短重或质量不合格怎么办?

words.tran_cn: 不合格的；被取消资格的
不合格；取消资格；被罚下场
使不合格；取消…的资格（disqualify的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to stop someone from taking part in an activity because they have broken a rule

trans.tran_cn: 使无资格，使不合格，取消…的资格
trans.tran_en: When someone is disqualified, they are officially stopped from taking part in a particular event, activity, or competition, usually because they have done something wrong
